basalt.util

Class AudioTrackUtil

  • basalt.util.AudioTrackUtil

  • public class AudioTrackUtil

    The utility class which converts AudioTracks to easily-transportable data and vice versa.

    • Method Detail

      • fromAudioTrack

        public java.lang.String fromAudioTrack(com.sedmelluq.discord.lavaplayer.track.AudioTrack track)

        Converts a not-null AudioTrack into its data representation, which is then used for various purposes.

        The data representation is used mainly by clients in order to play media sources, as passing/storing an entire JSON Object is a little harder and less performant.

        Additionally, Basalt makes no requests in order to resolve the track data as it already has been resolved. When converting strings via the AudioTrackUtil.toAudioTrack method, similarly, Basalt doesn't have to make requests in order to decode the track as the data already contains all the information.

        Parameters:
        track - The track object to be encoded.
        Returns:
        The encoded data of the track.
        See Also:
        AudioTrackUtil.toAudioTrack

      • toAudioTrack

        public com.sedmelluq.discord.lavaplayer.track.AudioTrack toAudioTrack(java.lang.String data)

        Converts a not-null data representation of an AudioTrack into an AudioTrack, which is then used for various purposes.

        This track is only really used internally by Basalt in order to play the raw track itself (as opposed to the data representation which is used mainly to transport a track object over the net).

        Additionally, and similarly to the AudioTrackUtil.fromAudioTrack method, Basalt does not have to make any requests to resolve the track data as it is already contained inside the string.

        Parameters:
        data - The encoded track data, to be decoded into an AudioTrack.
        Returns:
        The track object represented in the encoded data.
        See Also:
        AudioTrackUtil.fromAudioTrack
